Sandwave roadmap

Stay up to date with the latest Sandwave roadmap. Items in the 'Now' status are currently worked on, items in the 'Next' status will be picked up in the next 1 or 2 sprints and for items in the 'Later' status it is our intention to pick them up in the coming 1 to 3 months.

Information about all of our latest releases can be found here.

If you have any questions about this roadmap, feel free to contact our Product Owner.

Now

Tech-savvy

Hosting package upgrades

This feature introduces upgrades and downgrades for hosting packages...

Tech-savvy

Vouchers

Voucher codes can be redeemed giving the customer a certain discount.

Tech-savvy

Discounts

Product discounts allow you to add custom prices for specific products to one or more customers. You can make custom prices for registrations, transfers and/or prolongations.

Tech-savvy

Customer contact management

Customers will be able to edit their contact data and account type. Historic data will be stored.

Next

Tech-savvy

VIES VAT API

Integration with the API as provided by European Commission, to be able to check the validity of European VAT numbers.

Tech-savvy

MOSS API

Integration with the MOSS API as provided by the European Commission, to set VAT percentage based on country of origin.
